channel.title: Run.bat source error
channel.description:
i run my source and it says this and i cant login.
[code]Server is already in use.[/code] but on my tabs i dont got my server running at all, and i think the problem was lastnight i was running an auto restarter and my dad shut computer down. but i dont know how to fix this problem.

item.title: Run.bat source error
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

What the hell are you talking about?

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat source error
item.dc:creator: @Gl_Then_Gf Gl Then Gf
item.description:
@Gl_Then_Gf wrote:

that should not be in your run. bat,

u saved the restarter and not working… here’s link of jdk code update 2 and 18 in comments

it helped me and helped alllottt of people out…

put the code of what java – 2 or 18 update in the edit, but this is for the edit compile… get code for run.bat on google. and you then edit that…

compile and then it should work

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat source error
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Are you running any other programs that may be using the same port?

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat source error
item.dc:creator: @bowzer bowzer
item.description:
@bowzer wrote:

i checked and there is no java.exe running in myprocesses task manager. you know exactly what it would be called? and if you need the code of my run.bat its…

@echo off cls echo Voule Auto restart tskill java /a echo Restarting server title EvolutionX V1 java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat source error
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Look in your process and kill any Java.exe’s that are running.

Right click the start menu and hit task manager, than click processes.

Read full topic
